name: Goranor
description:
Goranor Demo

Playtime: 1-1.5 hours

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace & RTP assets

--

"I've never had a chance to become strong. I've lived here all my life. Then when the war came, I couldn't do anything."

"It takes a lot of strength to help others be strong."

"I don't really feel like I've helped anyone, though. Grandma's been teaching me for years, but still I can barely treat a scratch.

So many people died.
If you count it all up, are we really doing any good?"

"You can't think like that. We just help the ones we can."

--

Two great powers, to the West and to the Far East, fighting for domination.

East Goranor, a modest yet proud land, caught in the middle.

Many years have passed since the war that destroyed everything, when a stranger from the West appears, in search of a cure for an impossible disease.

But a mysterious chain of events casts his mission in doubt...

and calls into question who is the real enemy, and who is worth saving.

--

FEATURES

  • Open world-style map - no awkward screen transitions!
  • A unique turn-based battle system that requires real strategy to win
  • Weapon upgrade system + skills unique to each character
  • Multiple puzzles and minigames
  • A rich and emotional narrative

*Note: This is a demo and may contain bugs/issues with gameplay balance. If you get stuck at any point, refer to the playthrough linked above.
